Headline: Trump Imposes New Tariffs
Description: Trump’s new tariffs on metals hit Iran’s trade partners worsening economy.

Headline: Student Protests Escalate
Description: Tehran University students protest after a murder signaling unrest.

Headline: Rial Hits New Low
Description: Iranian rial drops to 860000 per USD amid Trump’s sanctions.

Headline: Khamenei Rejects U.S. Talks
Description: Supreme Leader’s refusal to negotiate sparks fears of further isolation.
